snippet.title: Rube Goldberg Trailer for Leo 's Fortune [Original video]
snippet.description:
- Download on the App Store: http://bit.ly/leosfortune-appstore
- Download on Google Play: http://bit.ly/leosfortune-googleplay
- Behind the scenes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gHJCuvUzRCI
- Infographics: http://bit.ly/leo-info

Watch this Rube Goldberg machine come to life as Leo overcomes obstacles: wheels, saws, hammer, train, etc.

Thank you for the many perfect editorial and user reviews, which mean very much to our small development team.

Embark on a beautifully handcrafted journey to recover Leo's stolen fortune!

Leo's Fortune will challenge players with a multitude of puzzles and traps set in environments ranging from lush jungles to arid deserts and more.

Join the Leo's Fortune community:
http://facebook.com/leosfortune
http://twitter.com/leosfortune
http://leosfortune.com
